divs: sighting detailsme and 2 of my friends were sitting outside of the tattoo studio i work at.when i looked up i saw the lights i had seen the previous week.i yelled to the guys "look! look in the sky over there, there it is, the lights i saw last week"! kenny and my other friend looked up and saw them too in less than a couple of seconds. the light were an orange\amber\yellow.they were 5 of the in the western sky.they appeared in succession.one after the other like rapping you finger on a table pinky to forefinger.then still stationary they disappeared. only to reappear to the east of where they were a few seconds later. this is the second week in a row i've seen them.in the same general area.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Augusta
There was one other sighting in Augusta on or around March 17th 2009
